As in 2013 and 2016, Wembley fixtures are no ordinary matchdays, with a 90,000-strong crowd travelling to north-west London on April 17th.

articles.title: Eight people arrested after disorder at Preston North End vs Blackpool match - Lancashire Evening Post
articles.description: Eight people were arrested for various offences following disorder at Blackpool's derby clash against Preston North End.
articles.content:
Preston North End hosted Blackpool at Deepdale in an eagerly-awaited Lancashire derby on Tuesday night (April 5).
